}} Kogelo is a village on the shores of Lake Victoria in Kenya. It is found in Kenya's Siaya County and is best known as the place of birth of former U.S. President Barack Obama's father. ==Obama Fame== In 2008 when Barack was running for President, Kogelo gained international attention as the place of his father's death.https://www.nation.co.ke/news/Kogelo-explodes-with-joy-as-Obama-returns/1056-4661982-11mpq6z/index.html | Kogelo explodes with joy as Obama returns to fatherâ€™s villagehttps://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2018/jun/14/obama-ancestral-village-kogelo-kenya-hopes-visit-b/ Obama ancestral village of Kogelo, Kenya, hopes visit boosts economy - Washington Times == References == Category:Villages in Africa Category:Settlements in Kenya
title: Kogelo
